entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023
